main event: A round, luminous object was observed hovering approximately 300 yards from the observer at Kelly Air Force Base, Texas on July 24, 1951.
interesting points: The object was observed visually with the aid of binoculars from the Control Tower at Kelly AFB.
The object had no definite shape, but was described as a round luminous mass approximately 40 feet in diameter.
The object was observed for approximately 5 minutes.
The weather was good with visibility of around 15 miles.
The object was observed to be hovering and did not display any exhaust or propulsion system.
witnesses: Military personnel at the control tower
